K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:114b-0: @114b ;;rgya las 'gyur ba skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:114b-3: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-0: sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa sems @115a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-2: mang po tshogs pa yid bsdus te nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-3: bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes ma mthol tshangs byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-4: mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-5: mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing thab tu skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-6: kun tu ltung ba med na ma sma bar 'khod cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-7: kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-8: legs pa chen po yod pa'i rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-10: dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-11: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir na mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe so sor thar pa la btsud cing lci ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-12: gus shing rin cher byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-13: so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-15: tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-16: mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-17: nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-18: btson khri mun nas phyung ba dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-19: lam ring por song ba las slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115a-21: kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-0: g-yo dka' bas na kha na ma tho ba las brnyas te med @115b snyam du byas na chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-1: rgyun gyis na snod chen po 'gang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-2: yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-3: re zhig mi lus tshor na bskal pa khri'i bar du'ang slar mi lus mi thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-4: dar ba'i tshe mi sdod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-7: mi'i tshe'ang rtag pa med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-8: dpa' rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-11: da dus kho na la bab kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-12: mang po'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-13: pag byas la le lo bla khyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-15: gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams kyi yid mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-17: sems bsdus la rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la'ang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ci'ang thob pa med par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-18: mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-19: de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i phyir chu bo gangg'a'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:115b-20: de'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-1: sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-2: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la'ang de bzhin 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-3: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang de bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-4: dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' slobs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-7: ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-8: nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-9: khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gcig nas gcig tu sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-10: de nas padmo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang de ba'i sengge'i gdan gyi steng nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-11: 'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas la sbran te nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u gzungs su zungs la dengs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116a-12: yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi sh'akya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan chad kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod de khyod la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zungs la byos shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-0: de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs @116b rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi sh'akya thub pa padmo'i snod kyi khems na lham me lhang de ba'i sengge'i khri las 'das te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-1: so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir nur nas lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-2: kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste gcig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-5: dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa'ang khong du chud nas so sor padmo'i snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-6: rang bzhin gyi bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste dzambu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas rang bzhin gyi bskal pa me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-7: gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-8: 'od shin tu bzang po'i khang par 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-9: de nas yang sengge'i khri las langs te sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas gral bcu'i chos bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:116b-10: de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-0: de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas phyogs shing lta @117a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-2: de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te 'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-3: de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te gnam bden gnam du phyin nas sa bcu'i chos bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-4: de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje bcu bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-5: de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-6: de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon lam bcu bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-7: de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te nga'i thog ma'i phyi mo'i padmo me tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-8: gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi sh'akya thub pa'ang de bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117a-11: bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-0: de'i tshe sh'akya thub pa padmo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas lding pa'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas yas @117b babs te dzambu'i gling gi ka pi lar skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-6: lo bdun na rab tu byung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-7: lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas nga'i mtshan ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-8: sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-9: mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri la 'dug nas dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-10: de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-11: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus gtsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir gangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na khams gcig nas gcig so so mi mthun te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-12: tha dad pa'i grangs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:117b-14: nga khams 'dir lan brgyad stong phyin te; khams dzambu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems kyi gnas kyi mdo che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-0: de nas gnam gyi pho brang nas mar babs te dzambu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs @118a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-1: rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi mi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-2: sems thog pa g-yos pa ni; rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-3: rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-6: thog ma'i phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-7: sems can thams cad la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal ba yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-8: thams cad kyi shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-12: sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-13: tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nams yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-14: rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-15: so sor thar pa 'di rnams bcu ni; sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi tshul khrims byas te dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-16: ngas de mang po 'di'i phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-17: rdzogs longs spyod pa nga bdag ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118a-18: padmo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-0: mtha' @118b bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-1: sh'akya thub pa stong du bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-2: me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-3: khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-4: kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-5: mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-6: de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-7: rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-8: sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po; ;kun kyang rdzu phran mang por 'dren //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-9: gcig car nga yi gnas su 'ongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-10: sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-11: zil dngar sgo mo de nas bye //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-13: slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-14: kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-15: nga yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton lhogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-16: tshul khrims chen po rtogs par lnga bcu brgyad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-17: tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-18: gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-19: byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-20: 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grub; ;gdod ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis blags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-21: ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton blags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-22: byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-23: klad la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-24: thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-25: nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-26: sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:118b-27: so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-0: @119a *// mang po yid kun brtags par ches //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-1: khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-2: nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-3: rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed; ;tshul khrims le'u kun chog gtsang zin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-4: yid sems yod pa thams cad ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-5: kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-6: sems can sangs rgyas khrims mnod pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-7: de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-8: tshor chen sa dang mtshungs zin te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-10: mang po kun gyis gus par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-11: sems gcig brtul te nga klog nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-12: de'i tshe na sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs bla na med pa'i g-yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-16: dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-18: sri zhu byas te bla ma'i yid dang ma 'gal ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-19: chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-25: de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119a-26: de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-0: gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam bco brgyad @119b dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-1: 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-2: rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-3: sems gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po blags te byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-4: nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-5: khyed la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-6: sems g-yos te phyogs bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-7: g-yo zhing bskyed pa bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-9: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-10: 'ung na tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-11: rkyen med pa'i 'od ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-19: yod pa'ang ma yin; med pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-20: rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-21: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-22: gdod ma phyi mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-23: lam gyi rtsa ba bas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:119b-25: sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:120a-0: sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs @120a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:120a-1: so; ;legs par bslab pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:120a-2: sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtag par nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:120a-3: sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-5: nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo dang nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha zas dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-8: mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-9: chos kyi phyir lus dang bsdos te chos gsol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-10: de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-11: sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la'ang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-13: mdo sde 'chang ba'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'chad pa yod na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims gyi glegs bam khyer te chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs so; ;la la zhig ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-18: chos 'chad do cog gi sar phyin par byas te mnyan cing 'dod pa'i shan gnas su song ste ma mnyan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-20: sangs rgyas kyi bu sems ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:125b-21: theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-1: khrims la 'dug kyang khar smra na sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-2: rtag par theg pa chung du rnam gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-3: mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing log par lta'o cog gi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-4: chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-5: sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab bo cog rtag par rim gro byas te gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i bsod nams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-11: dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-12: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta gshe zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-13: yul mkhar du ma phyin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-17: tshal na nad pa 'dug pa mthong ste ra mda' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-18: rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-19: sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126a-22: sta re la sogs te 'thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-0: sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang 'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chad @126b du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-2: pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-3: sems can thams cad bsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-4: mtshon cha ched kar 'chang ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-6: 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam bcu ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-7: bslabs te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-8: 'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad do; ;sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-9: sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsam ste nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'drul ba dmag gi g-yul bshams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-10: dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te sems can mang po bsad na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-11: byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'dul yang mi rung na ched kar yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-12: de la ched kar byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-17: gshin sgrom ro gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-18: gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-19: de la ched kar byed pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:126b-21: sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de pha log pa dge ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-1: po; ya rabs btsun pa la ma nyes par log pa bdun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-5: gnyen pa rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-7: sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-8: de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gnas su lhung na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-9: sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de ched kar me chen po btang la ri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-11: ri lung dbyar zla ra ba man chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-12: ston zla tha chung yan chad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-14: la la zhig gis me btang ste gzhan gyi khang khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-21: bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi rdzas sreg tu mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-22: la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-23: sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-25: gnyen rnam drug la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-26: dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang ci'ang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127a-27: tshul khrims nod cing gzungs su 'dzin bar bstan pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-0: gzhung dang lugs shes shing @127b byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-1: bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-2: rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g-yo bar bstan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-3: gcig nas gcig tu go rim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-4: chos kyis cho ga shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-5: byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-7: gzhan nyan thos kyi theg pa chung du rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-10: log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-11: sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-13: yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa rgyad grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-14: tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin bshad pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-15: dka' thub ces bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-21: sor mo bsregs te sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:127b-22: de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-2: 'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-3: rkang lag gtong phod par byas te byin la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-4: de nas gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-9: de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i phyir lan glan pa'i rigs pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-13: 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon mchog gsum la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-15: sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-18: ming snyan pa'i phyir rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-20: blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-21: snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-22: btsan ngag gis bsdigs te nan gyis nor dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-23: khe tshol lo cog gi ming ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-24: ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-25: gzhan la'ang snying rje med cing sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128a-26: ltung ba'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob pa na nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la de'i gzhung dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-0: don @128b sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-1: byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni; bdag la brnyas shing bslus /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-2: gzhan la'ang brnyas te chos so cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-3: ltung ba'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-4: tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas phan tshun gnyis kyis bar du bar bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-5: 'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan mi byed pa med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-7: de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o; ;sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de ci'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing pho'o cog ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-11: bdag sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gar skyes so cog na'ang de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-12: 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-13: de bsad cing zos na bdag gi pha ma bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-14: gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-15: sa dang chu thams cad ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-16: bdag gi lus snga ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:128b-17: me dang rlung ngo cog ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-1: gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por btang ba'i las byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-2: gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-3: thabs spyad de bdag gis 'or ba dang ra mda' byas te nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-4: rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad de bstan bslabs nas sems can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-6: bu pho dang nu bo zhig shi na de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad na de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad de mtho ris su skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-7: de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-12: tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na sems gus par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-13: sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang tshul khrims gcig pu gcig nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-14: sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-15: khros pa'i lan khros pas mi glan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-16: brdeg pa'i lan brdeg pas mi glan /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-18: phu nu bo dang gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129a-19: gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-0: srog gcod kyang sha @129b glan na sri zhu'i chos dang 'gal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-1: bran pho mo la ngag ngan pas spyos shing brdegs la nyin gcig cing las ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la'ang sdig grangs med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-2: ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-3: rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-4: gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha glan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-5: sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung te ci'ang mi shes par bdag dbang po rno la mdzangs par rlom zhing la la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-6: lo grangs rgan zhing phyug btsan snyems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-7: la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-10: nor rin po che sna bdun mang du 'dog pas rgyags dregs sngon chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-13: chos kyi mkhan po la la ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-22: dbang po ma tshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-24: tshul khrims so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:129b-25: chos kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-0: thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos kyi @130a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-1: mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-2: sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems la yi dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la ltas bzang po mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-5: ltas bzang po ma mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-8: lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis gzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-9: ltas bzang po mthong nas sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-11: ltas bzang po ma mthong na sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims ma nos kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-13: la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i mdun du nod na ltas bzang po mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130a-15: chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-0: @130b ltas bzang po mi dgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-1: chos kyi mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste gus pa'i sems skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-2: rgyang grags stong la tshun tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-4: ltas bzang po mthong ba dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-5: chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-9: blon po rnams byams shing mdza' ba snyems te byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-10: tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'dir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-12: le lo'i sems kyis gcig pu gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma glan na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-13: sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-14: tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-15: theg pa chen po'i drang po'i chos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-18: drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom mi nus pa rnams ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-19: dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:130b-20: slar log par bltas ste theg pa chung du rnam gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-2: aa bhi dharma bshad pa slob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-3: theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-7: de lta na ched kar byas pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-9: sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin chos 'chang ba bdag po byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-10: dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-11: ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-12: bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-14: de lta bu byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la mi mdza' ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-15: 'thab cing rtsod pa'ang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-16: dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge ba'i bsrungs te ma 'os par mi spyad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-17: bdag gis bdag gi sgor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-18: de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-19: rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131a-20: sangs rgyas kyi bu sngon chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang du 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-0: dge slong mgron pa zhig @131b phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-4: dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-5: 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-8: bskyal te zas bsti stang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-9: khang khyim nyal ba'i mal cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-11: sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin no; ;la la zhig bdag la nor med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-14: bu mo dag btsongs te ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-15: sbyin pa bdag la la zhig 'ongs te dge 'dun phal dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-16: dge 'dun gyi mgron pa zhig gnyer te yon gyi nor skal pa yod pa'i sar dge 'dun khyim bdag pos dge 'dun mgron pa'i rnams rim gyis gnyer ba btang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-17: de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-18: dge 'dun mgron pa ma btang na dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-20: sh'akya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:131b-23: sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang go rims su ma bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-0: de lta bu'i yon gyi nor @132a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-1: rdzas ni; phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-2: de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-3: phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-9: nad pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-10: sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-11: rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer te bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-12: dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge bskos la dris te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-13: de ring go rim gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-14: gud nas dgra bcom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-16: dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas go rims su bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-17: de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-19: sangs rgyas bdun la ni; gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132a-20: sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-0: sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems @132b spyad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir pho mo'i g-yem pa tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-2: bdag 'du ba pho mo'i mtshan lta rmi lam bzang ngan 'gro la po zhes zer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-4: log pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-6: dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la dug rtsi rnam pa brgya stong byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-8: gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-9: byad ste ma la sogs pa snying rje yong med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-10: sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur pa byas te gzhan la gnyan sgyu ma smos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-13: las ni; yod pa'i las byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-14: tha mal pa'i bud med dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-15: skyes pa'i smyan byed cing mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-16: ci la'ang mi 'jigs shing chags pa med; dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-17: lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-19: chom po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:132b-21: tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-1: ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-2: sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-3: sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi na ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-5: rkun po chen pos sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-6: byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs tshong ba mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-7: chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge tshong ba mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-10: gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-11: la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas bran pho bran mor byas pa zhig byang chub sems dpas de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed de thabs kyis ra mda' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-12: skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod do cog kyang slar slob cing ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-18: tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis blus shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-19: de ltar ma blus na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133a-20: sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-0: srang @133b dang bre che chung 'chang ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-1: rtsa lag snyems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-2: sems can la phrag dog byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-3: pha log po bcings drags byas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-4: ngo so don du yod pa zhig btang byi la dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-8: phya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-9: de lta bu ched dkar gsos na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-10: sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de pho mo la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g-yul dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-11: dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-12: yang gcig tu dung 'bud pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-19: rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-22: par sig gi rtsed mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-23: ra 'bri lug gi dmag gi rtsed mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-26: bum bu la rde'u 'phen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-28: me long brud pa byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-33: de rnams la mo gdab tu mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-34: rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:133b-35: de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-0: sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par bzung @134a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-1: ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-2: nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton bklags na rdo rje dang mtshungs so; ;rkyal pa thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshungs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-3: gcig tu na dge slong rtsvas bcings ba dang mtshungs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-4: theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-5: da dung sangs rgyas su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams ni; sangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad par sems la bsam la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung du gnyis dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-7: mur 'dug la sems kyis bsam na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-8: sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-12: dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-13: rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-14: tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134a-16: g-yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-0: bskyed cing @134b gso gso ba bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-1: chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-2: sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-3: sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bzung la sran thub par bya ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-4: lus dang srog kyang bor te sems la sems pa'i bar mi gtsang par sems bsam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-5: de la byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-6: sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzungs su bzung ste smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-7: bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-9: ral gri'i ri la song yang rung ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-10: tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-11: nam du'ang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad gsog pa mi byed par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-12: gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-13: lcags bsregs pa'i dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-14: de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar yun du tshul khrims bral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i spyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:134b-15: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-1: nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-2: me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ongs pa la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi za bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-3: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-4: lus 'di me chen pos bsregs pa'i lcags kyi dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-5: lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khri bo cog gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-6: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-7: lus 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdud rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas gtsags kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-8: mthar tshul khrims bshig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-9: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-10: lus 'dis bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-11: mthar tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135a-14: zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-0: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon @135b to; ;lus 'di mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te rdul phra mo bzhin du song yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-1: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-2: stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-3: mdung rtses mig gnyis brus shing gtsags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pha logs kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-4: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-5: lcags kyi smyung bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-6: rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la mi mnyan par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-7: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-8: bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos so cog la mi snom par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-9: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:135b-10: bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gris bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi'i cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-2: sta re rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi brkam mi chags par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-3: yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-4: sems can no cog sangs rgyas su yod par smon to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-5: byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-6: sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-7: dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-8: tshul khrims su 'jug pa so shing dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-11: ril ba dang; lhung bzed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-24: sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa'i cha grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gron yo byad bco brgyad rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-25: sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136a-26: dpyid zla ra ba tshes bco lnga nas dpyid zla tha chung tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-0: ston zla 'bring po tshes @136b bco lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-3: de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-4: ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-5: de ste khrims klog pa'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-7: gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton bklags la gcig gis mthol tshangs bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-11: stong brgya de'ang mi gcig gis kha ton klog go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-16: so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-18: bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-19: gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-20: sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:136b-22: rgyal po mi srun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-3: sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-4: bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-5: de la ched kar song na ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-7: sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-8: tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni; sngar 'dug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-9: tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-18: bran pho mo la sogs pa tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-21: phyis go rim bzhin du 'dug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:137a-23: mi glen po bzhin du rgan yang rung /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-13: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ongs pa'i rnams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-14: da de'i khar kha ton byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-15: sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-17: ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad cig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-18: da ltar gyi kha ton byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-19: phyis kyang kha ton byed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:142b-20: nga'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-1: la sogs pas sems can phal mang po rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-7: dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na 'grus par kha ton klogs la bkrol bshad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-8: yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis skal pa rtag par 'dug ste khrims kyi glegs bam dus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te sems can thams cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gtad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-9: tshe tshe rabs su yang ngan song dang bgegs brgyad kyi nang du'ang mi ltung zhing rtag par mi'i lam dang gnam gyi steng du skye'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-10: ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phya ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing gus par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143a-11: gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nang nas gcig pu gcig bu nas rgya che zhing mngon bar bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-0: de'i slob @143b ma mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas sangs rgyas kyis kha ton bklags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te dga' gzha' nas rtag par gzungs su bzung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-1: de ltar sh'akya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis yan chad padmo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos kyi sgo mo le'u'i nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-2: stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-3: dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bsgo ba bshad kyis mi lang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-5: mang po phal tag par gzungs su gzungs la kha ton du lhogs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-6: de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-7: stong phrag brgya'ang 'bum gyi khams padmo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-9: grangs med pa'i smon lam gyi snod; yon tan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-10: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad grangs med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:143b-12: chos kyi sgo mo'ang bshad zin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-1: brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste dga' zhing gus par byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-2: sems kyi gnas rgya cher phye ba'i gzungs ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-3: sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal ba'i le'u'i nang nas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-4: sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-5: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-6: bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-7: bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-8: gzhan la gnod pa de ni byang chub ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-9: gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-10: mig can mi bde yod las byol te 'gro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-11: mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na; ;sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-12: gsum ste thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-13: gnod la mi smra mi sems te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-14: so sor thar pa bzhin du sdom; ;zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-15: gnas kyang dben par 'jug par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-16: rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-17: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-18: bzhi ste log par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-19: ji ltar bung ba me tog gi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-20: kha dog bsung la mi gnod par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144a-21: khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-0: de bzhin byang chub @144b grong du spyod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-1: gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-2: gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-5: lnga ste gser thub sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-6: bsam gtan la ni ma byol bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-7: thub pa rnams kyis tshul thub slobs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-8: mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-9: mngon par zhi bas rtag tu dran pa'i yid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-10: drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-11: thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-12: dge 'o cog ni rdzogs par bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-13: bdag gi sems kyang shin tu gdul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-14: de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-15: bdun te sh'akya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-16: lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-17: ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-18: yid kyi sdom pa yang ni dge /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-19: dge 'o thams cad sdom pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-20: byang chub kun la mgon skyabs byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-21: nyon mongs thams cad kun las skyob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-22: byang chub dag srung yid kyang sdom //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-23: lus kyis mi dge mi bya zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-24: 'di gsum las las rnam par skyongs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-25: 'thob bo drang srong gsungs pa'i lam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-26: mi yis brdegs spyos sha mi glan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-27: sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-28: gshe ba'i mi la'ang rtag tu gcang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-29: mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:144b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyis rabs btsun byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-1: rten ra mda' pha skyabs nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-2: sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-3: ngas rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-4: sangs rgyas kun dang slob ma rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-5: chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 'dzin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-6: gcig la gcig kyang gus par byos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-7: chos la drin gzo cho ga tshang na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-8: bya ba med pa'i chos thob nus //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-9: tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-10: sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-066-014:145a-11: chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs so //
